message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the purchase of my product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on a high-quality item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to the table.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings. Let me know what you think.
